name: Keep your pants on
description:
KYPO is a brutal dungeon crawler that takes cues from popular hack-and-slash titles such as Diablo and Path of Exile. It blends aspects of gear collecting, character growth and item randomization with elements of dungeon crawling. It draws inspiration from Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup and will keep you entertained.

The game

Make your way down the dungeon, cast spells, fire projectiles and bash your way down each floor. Explore the randomly generated mayhem and trace your own path with each decision you make; should you focus on strength, intelligence, dexterity? Not with this gear! Pick your class and get ready for some epic dungeon crawling, but more importantly, keep your pants on!

Features
  • 55+ monsters
  • 100+ items, along with 14+ modifiers
  • 4 classes
  • 18 spells
  • 18 abilities
  • 10+ ranged items
  • Generated gear & dungeon floors
Notes:
  • The mac build is highly experimental and does not really work as of now
